cards.flavor: Four gray trees and a long, coiling snake. What am I? —Zhalfirin riddle
cards.name: Bull Elephant
cards.text: When Bull Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."
—Purraj of Urborg
cards.name: Dark Privilege
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.

cards.flavor: If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a king cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend. —Suq'Ata wisdom
cards.name: King Cheetah

cards.flavor:
"Ah, I remember my first death."
—Zarkuu, necrosavant
cards.name: Necrosavant
cards.text: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Ovinomancer
cards.text:
When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand.
{T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 0/1 green Sheep creature token.

cards.flavor:
"By the tongues of a thousand serpents, this time I do not lie."
—Ahmahz il Kin, Suq'Ata diplomat
cards.name: Peace Talks
cards.text: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.

cards.flavor:
"My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."
—Kaervek
cards.name: Urborg Mindsucker
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Vampirism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.
Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

cards.flavor:
"Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better."
—Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert
cards.name: Viashino Sandstalker
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

cards.flavor:
"The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition."
—Kaervek
cards.name: Wicked Reward
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Wicked Reward, sacrifice a creature.
Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.
